Class ScreenSaverController

java.lang.Object
ScreenSaverController
public class ScreenSaverController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the user input and automatic line drawing on the canvas. This class binds GUI elements (Canvas and TextField) to animation logic.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after FXML loading. Sets up the graphics context, text field listener, and starts the drawing animation. No parameters and no return value.

    • drawRandomLine

      private void drawRandomLine()
      Draws a single random line on the canvas. If the max line count is reached, the canvas is cleared and the line count is reset. No parameters and no return value.
